00023 #ifndef _CTK_LIST_H
00024 #define _CTK_LIST_H

00042 typedef struct ctk_list_item {
00043     ea_addr_t next;     
00045     ea_addr_t backing;  
00047 } ctk_list_item_t;
00048 
00050 typedef ea_addr_t ctk_list_item_ea_t;
00051 
00055 typedef struct {
00056     unsigned int lock;
00057     ctk_list_item_ea_t head;
00058     ctk_list_item_ea_t tail;
00059     unsigned int item_count;
00060     unsigned int item_size;
00061     unsigned char pad[0] __attribute__((aligned(128)));
00062 } ctk_list_t __attribute((aligned(128)));
00063 
00065 typedef ea_addr_t ctk_list_ea_t;
00066 
00070 #define CTK_LIST_EA(list)  ((ctk_list_ea_t)(unsigned long)(&list))
00071 
00075 #define CTK_LIST_VAR(list_ea)  (*(ctk_list_t*)(unsigned long)(list_ea))
00076 
00080 #define CTK_LIST_PTR(list_ea)  ((ctk_list_t*)(unsigned long)(list_ea))
00081 
00085 #define CTK_LIST_ITEM_PTR(item_ea) \
00086 ((ctk_list_item_t*)(unsigned long)(item_ea))
00087 
00088 #include "ctk_list-impl.h"
00089 
00090 #define ctk_list_iterate(l, type, x) \
00091   for ((x) = (type)CTK_LIST_ITEM_PTR(CTK_LIST_PTR(l)->head); \
00092        (x) != NULL; \
00093        (x) = (type)CTK_LIST_ITEM_PTR(((ctk_list_item_t*)(x))->next))
00094 
00095 #define __ctk_list_iterate(l, x) \
00096   for ((x) = CTK_LIST_ITEM_PTR(CTK_LIST_PTR(l)->head); \
00097        (x) != NULL; \
00098        (x) = CTK_LIST_ITEM_PTR(((ctk_list_item_t*)(x))->next))
00099 
00100 #define __ctk_list_iterate_ea(l, ea) \
00101   for ((ea) = CTK_LIST_PTR(l)->head; (ea) != 0;  \
00102         (ea) = ((ctk_list_item_t*)(ea))->next)
00103 
00104 #define ctk_list_next(x, type) \
00105     (type)CTK_LIST_ITEM_PTR((CTK_LIST_ITEM_PTR(x)->next))
00106 #define ctk_list_next_next(x, type) ctk_list_next(ctk_list_next(x, type), type)

00164 static inline int ctk_list_get_remaining_count(ctk_list_ea_t list) {
00165     return _ctk_list_get_remaining_count(list);
